file_content.text: We will drive the Empire off Corellia. This is good.
The Empire will never surrender. They must be defeated--permanently.
We must all strengthen our connection to the Force. It is our only hope of victory.
The Jedi must stand united. We can save Corellia if we fight as one.
I do not wish to kill, but I cannot feel bad about taking our enemies' lives.
Imperial war droids make good scrap....
The resistance fighters are safe. This is a great victory. You have my thanks.
All of Corellia is in danger. We need to stop the Empire.
The war is escalating.
The line is drawn. There must be total enemy defeat.
There aren't many Jedi left on Corellia. What's your name?
Who are you?
Goril Sevintran. I arrived with the first wave. Now I serve among the last.
I'm in charge here, now.
All Jedi forces serve under me. Reinforcements are gathering at these coordinates. Go and wait for my return.
I have been here since the fighting began. I have seen much. Listen to my advice.
Don't underestimate our adversary. The Empire has killed many Jedi. Victory may come at great cost.
He's a regular ray of sunshine.
Doesn't it always seem to?
That is what the Emperor hopes.
Then be ready to pay it.
Jedi + T7 = keep price of victory low
I will meet you at the rendezvous.
Make yourself useful out there. Eliminate as many enemies as you can.
This is for every world the Empire enslaved!
If you will not surrender!
You face the Jedi Order's might!
We will defend this world to the end!
You should never have come here!
Go back to the shadows where you belong!
You will not escape our justice!
Corellia will be free!
